Submodules¶

convlab.modules.dst.state_tracker module¶

class convlab.modules.dst.state_tracker.Tracker[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for dialog state tracker models.

init_session()[source]¶

Init the Tracker to start a new session.

update(user_act=None)[source]¶

Update dialog state based on new user dialog act. :param sess: (for models implemented using tensorflow) The Session Object to assist model running. :type sess: Session Object :param user_act: The dialog act (or utterance) of user input. The class of user_act depends on

the method of state tracker. For example, for rule-based tracker, type(user_act) == dict; while for MDBT, type(user_act) == str.
Returns:
Updated dialog state, with the same form of previous state. Note that the dialog state is
also a private data member.
Return type:new_state (dict)
